entry.title: Burned Into Your Shadow
entry.summary:
Author: Mieczyslaw

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,013Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 86

Summary: Stiles is kidnapped by Theo, whose obsession has turned dangerous. The pack scrambles, but it’s Derek who finds him — fast, brutal, and too shaken to hide it.Stiles survives with sarcasm and stubbornness, but afterward, things shift.Derek stays close.He watches over Stiles like something precious.Neither says what’s changed — but it’s there. In the silence. In every glance.As Theo stews in chains, Stiles leans on Derek more than he admits.And Derek? He’s already choosing him.Even if he doesn’t know how to say it yet.
